Text: @raymondhome Thx this one was only released in select theaters so I never got to see it, keep up the good work always appreciated!

For the purists, note what the uploader wrote about -- in the short parts where a foreign language is  spoken, there are hard subs (Italian I think), and then the English soft subs added more or less on top.
